comment: Membership in a power class. Theorem 86 of [Suppes] p. 47. Derived from ~ elpwg . In form of VD deduction with ` ph ` and ` ps ` as variable virtual hypothesis collections based on Mario Carneiro's metavariable concept. ~ elpwgded is ~ elpwgdedVD using conventional notation. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 23-Apr-2015.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
